metadata.description: Name of the resource group where all resources will be created
Random id to generate sufix for resources names. Do not change it.
Environment name used as a tag for all resources.
Language used when orchestrator needs send error messages to the UX.
Analyzer language used by Azure search to analyze indexes text content.
Search language, only valid when semantic reranking is used.
Language used for speech recognition in the frontend.
Language used for speech synthesis in the frontend.
Voice used for speech synthesis in the frontend.
GPT model used to answer user questions. Don't forget to check region availability.
GPT model version.
GPT model deployment name.
GPT model tokens per Minute Rate Limit (thousands). Default quota per model and region: gpt-4: 20; gpt-4-32: 60; All others: 240.
Embeddings model used to generate vector embeddings. Don't forget to check region availability.
Embeddings model version.
Embeddings model deployment name.
Embeddings model tokens per Minute Rate Limit (thousands). Default quota per model and region: 240
Azure OpenAI API version.
Orchestrator supports the following retrieval approaches: hybrid(term + vector search), semantic(hybrid + semantic reranking) or use oyd feature of Azure OpenAI.
Frequency of search reindexing. PT5M (5 min), PT1H (1 hour), P1D (1 day).
The number of tokens in each chunk.
The minimum chunk size below which chunks will be filtered.
The number of tokens to overlap between chunks.
Name of the container where source documents will be stored.
Primary location for all resources. No need to change since deployment() function will get the resource group location.
(optional) Id of the user or app to assign keyvault access. Keep it none if you don't want add any principal.
Cosmos DB Account Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Cosmos DB Database Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Key Vault Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Storage Account Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Speech Account Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Document Intelligence Account Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
App Service Plan Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
App Insights Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Front-end App Service Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Orchestrator Function Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Data Ingestion Function Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Search Service Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
OpenAI Service Name. Use your own name convention or leave as it is to generate a random name.
Cosmos DB account name, max length 44 characters, lowercase
Location for the Cosmos DB account.
The default consistency level of the Cosmos DB account.
Max stale requests. Required for BoundedStaleness. Valid ranges, Single Region: 10 to 2147483647. Multi Region: 100000 to 2147483647.
Max lag time (minutes). Required for BoundedStaleness. Valid ranges, Single Region: 5 to 84600. Multi Region: 300 to 86400.
Enable system managed failover for regions
The name for the database
The name for the container
Maximum autoscale throughput for the container

properties.accessPolicies: [if(not(empty(parameters('principalId'))), createArray(createObject('objectId', parameters('principalId'), 'permissions', createObject('secrets', createArray('get', 'list')), 'tenantId', subscription().tenantId)), createArray())]

metadata.description: Storage Account type
Location for all resources.
The language worker runtime to load in the function app.

siteConfig.appSettings: [concat(parameters('appSettings'), createArray(createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('storageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTAZUREFILECONNECTIONSTRING', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('storageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTSHARE', 'value', toLower(variables('functionAppName'))), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', parameters('appInsightsConnectionString')), createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', parameters('appInsightsInstrumentationKey')), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME', 'value', variables('functionWorkerRuntime')), createObject('name', 'AZURE_KEY_VAULT_ENDPOINT', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01').vaultUri)))]

appSettings.value: [union(parameters('appSettings'), createObject('SCM_DO_BUILD_DURING_DEPLOYMENT', string(parameters('scmDoBuildDuringDeployment')), 'ENABLE_ORYX_BUILD', string(parameters('enableOryxBuild'))), if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString), createObject()), if(not(empty(parameters('keyVaultName'))), createObject('AZURE_KEY_VAULT_ENDPOINT', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01').vaultUri), createObject()))]

metadata.description: The name of the app service resource within the current resource group scope
The app settings to be applied to the app service
Storage Account type
Location for all resources.
The language worker runtime to load in the function app.

siteConfig.appSettings: [concat(parameters('appSettings'), createArray(createObject('name', 'AzureWebJobsStorage', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('storageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTAZUREFILECONNECTIONSTRING', 'value', format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};EndpointSuffix={1};AccountKey={2}', variables('storageAccountName'), environment().suffixes.storage, listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', variables('storageAccountName')), '2022-05-01').keys[0].value)), createObject('name', 'WEBSITE_CONTENTSHARE', 'value', toLower(variables('functionAppName'))), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', 'value', '~4'), createObject('name', 'APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', 'value', parameters('appInsightsConnectionString')), createObject('name', 'APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY', 'value', parameters('appInsightsInstrumentationKey')), createObject('name', 'FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME', 'value', variables('functionWorkerRuntime')), createObject('name', 'AZURE_KEY_VAULT_ENDPOINT', 'value', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01').vaultUri)))]

metadata.description: The value of the secret. storage access, but do not hard code any secrets in your templates
